pullrequest.title: use CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR in pkg-config example test in case an arch-dependent lib folder is used

content.raw:
The thing is, it's not currently broken for anyone except the debbuilds. (Edit: by "currently", I mean "on the current default, without this PR")

Is there a specific technique that is being used by the debbuilds to force the `CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR` to include the architecture postfix for the example libraries? Could we disable that so the debbuilds reflect the normal user experience?
